TopicTitle: How do I find my previous forum activity?

Articles.Content:
I recall a time when I could view my own forum post activity further back than the system seems keyed to allow for now. Is it 24 hours that my posts remain visible within my history? 36?

At any rate, how do I look at my previous post activity, or keep tabs on ongoing threads, without saving bookmarks to my browser? Am I doing something wrong?

Thanks.

On the left side panel of your user profile (same area as the forum activity ticker) you should see an option labled "Find latest posts" That should show you significantly further back in your post history.
